snippet: Lawmakers in the lower house of Parliament gave tentative approval on Friday to a bill that would move up next year’s parliamentary elections by three months.
abstract: Lawmakers in lower house of Russian Parliament grant tentative approval to measure that will move up 2016 parliamentary elections by three months; critics have called measure attempt to lower public interest in campaign and weaken prospects of opposition.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers in the lower house of Parliament gave tentative approval on Friday to a bill that would move up next year’s parliamentary elections by three months.
